Question:
Where can I purchase VK-RA8M1?
Answer:
Please visit below link where you can proceed kit purchase. You can also check stock status from our Distributors.
https://www.renesas.com/us/en/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/ra-cortex-m-mcus/vk-ra8m1-ra8m1-voice-user-reference-kit
Suitable Products
RA8M1
